actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Aeronautical and Space Sciences (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-303.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Commission on Aeronautical and Space Sciences for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-303) Authorizes additional expenditures of $57,000 by the Senate Committee on Aeronautical and Space Sciences for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1975, through February 29, 1976.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Commission on Aeronautical and Space Sciences for inquiries and investigations.
